short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ExportThisCookie chrome plugin allows you to export cookies of the visited webpage in JSON format

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Export cookies in JSON format which can be directly imported in your code. 

Example: This comes handy while using python requests library.  This allows you export cookie in {"key":"value"} format.
